name: BDD

description: The right peer for the right problem.

name: Reveal.js
description: While reveal.js is a presentation framework, it is my perfect match for writing and presenting. Just works for me.

name: Kanban
description: Use Kanban for your daily work.

name: Scrum
description: The problem isn't Scrum, the problem is that companies don't providing the right environment for scrum. Do yourself a favor and always clarify the objectives.

name: Code Review
description: Divide and conquer, while you may do code reviews and pull request, the time feels wasted.

name: Kibana
description: Kibana is the right tool for Elasticsearch and Monitoring.

name: MariaDB
description: The better part of MySQL and our preferred db now for Wordpress and Mediawiki.

description: Elasticsearch wins.

description: Elasticsearch, Logstash and Kibana doesn't seem to get less

name: Github

name: Gradle
description: Gradle is easier to read and manage.

name: Virtual Machines
description: Since Docker is in the game don't use virtual machines as deployment or isolation unit. They are still eligible for POCs.

name: RiskShield
description: While the software itself is interesting in the architecture key points, you aren't a fraud prevention employee. Only because you understand it, doesn't mean you must do it.

description: If you code Sonar is a must.

name: Shell

name: Cobol
description: Do yourself a favor, and stay mentally healthy. You may earn a bunch of money, but for what price?

name: SAP
description: Never do SAP again.
